results.title: Lipid-altering efficacy of ezetimibe/simvastatin 10/40 mg compared with doubling the statin dose in patients admitted to the hospital for a recent coronary event: the INFORCE study.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: In @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ taking a statin and admitted to the hospital for investigation of a @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003323 @@@coronary event@@@, treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@Eze/Simva@@@ 10/40 mg for 12 weeks produced greater improvements in @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipids@@@ with a similar safety profile compared with doubling of the statin dose.

citations.NLM: Reckless JP, Henry P, Pomykaj T, Lim ST, Massaad R, Vandormael K, Johnson-Levonas AO, Lis K, Brudi P, Allen C. Lipid-altering efficacy of ezetimibe/simvastatin 10/40 mg compared with doubling the statin dose in patients admitted to the hospital for a recent coronary event: the INFORCE study. Int J Clin Pract. 2008 Apr;62(4):539-54. PMID: 18266852
